com.att.research.xacml.api

Interface StatusCode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JaxpStatusCode, StdStatusCode

    public interface StatusCode
    Defines the API for objects that represent XACML StatusCode values.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
      Implementations of the StatusCode interface must override the equals method as follows: Two StatusCodes (s1 and s2) are equal if: s1.getIdentifer().equals(s2.getIdentifier() AND s1.getChild() == null && s2.getChild() == null OR s1.getChild().equals(s2.getChild())
      StatusCode getChild()
      Gets a child StatusCode of this StatusCode if there is one.
      Identifier getStatusCodeValue()
      Retrieves the major status com.att.research.xacmo.common.Identifier for this StatusCode.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusCodeValue

        Identifier getStatusCodeValue()
        Retrieves the major status com.att.research.xacmo.common.Identifier for this StatusCode.
        Returns:
        the major status Identifier for this StatusCode

      • getChild

        StatusCode getChild()
        Gets a child StatusCode of this StatusCode if there is one.
        Returns:
        the child StatusCode of this StatusCode or null if there is none

      • equals

        boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
        Implementations of the StatusCode interface must override the equals method as follows: Two StatusCodes (s1 and s2) are equal if: s1.getIdentifer().equals(s2.getIdentifier() AND s1.getChild() == null && s2.getChild() == null OR s1.getChild().equals(s2.getChild())
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
